segments.text: Why do you want to go to the U . S . ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to enrich my knowledge in management . The United States is an ideal place for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What will you do when you come home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Before I work in the office , I was a teacher . So if possible , I'd like to come back to some school to pass on my new knowledge to more people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you feel your English is good enough for the course ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . You know , English is my present working language . Besides , I scored very high in TOEFL .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who will be your supporter during your stay in the States ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will support myself . In recent years , I have saved enough money for my study in the U . S .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long do you expect to stay there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will be there for three years .
segments.speaker: S2
